## Summary

- What changed?
- Why?

## Type of change

- [ ] feat
- [ ] fix
- [ ] chore
- [ ] docs
- [ ] refactor

## Checklist

- [ ] Branch name follows convention (`feat/...`, `fix/...`, `chore/...`)
- [ ] Commit messages are simple + clear (`feat: ...`, `fix: ...`, `chore: ...`)
- [ ] `npm run lint` passes
- [ ] `npm run build` passes
- [ ] `npm run db:validate` passes
- [ ] If schema changed: migration files are included in `prisma/migrations/**`

## Database changes (if applicable)

- [ ] `prisma/schema.prisma` updated
- [ ] Migration created with `npm run db:migrate:create -- --name <change-name>`
- [ ] Migration tested locally
